original_text: But during the night, one of the Lord God's angels came and he opened the prison gates. He led the apostles out of the prison.
korean_text: 주의 사자가 밤에 옥문을 열고 끌어내어 이르되

sentences.original_text: one of the Lord God's angels came
sentences.korean_translation: 주 하나님의 천사 중 한 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: and he opened the prison gates
He led the apostles out of the prison
